text: This is a list of Nepali-language novelists, poets and other writers. __NOTOC__ == B == * Bhanubhakta Acharya – (1814–1868) – poet and translator, first translation of Ramayana from Sanskrit, honored with the title of Adikavi (The First Poet) * Bhim Nidhi Tiwari == L == * Laxmi Prasad Devkota – (1909–1959) – poet, playwright and essayist == M == * Madhav Prasad Ghimire – (1919–2020) – poet == S == * Sanu Sharma - novelist, short story writer, poet, lyricist * Suman Pokhrel – (born 1967) – poet, lyricist, translator and artist == V == * Vishnu Raj Atreya – (1944 - 2020) – poet and scholar == References == Category:Lists of writers Category:Nepalese people
title: List of Nepali-language writers
